TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2AttributeStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement

Docs.summary: Represents the AttributeStatement element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.7.3].

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> property is initialized to an empty collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute> attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of type that contains the Attribute elements contained in this statement.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> property (collection) is initialized with the attributes in the specified collection.

Docs.exception:
is .
-or-
One of the elements of the collection specified by is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute attribute) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents a single Attribute element contained in this statement.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> property (collection) is initialized with the specified attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of attributes contained in the attribute statement. These attributes are associated with the assertion subject. [Saml2Core, 2.7.3]
Docs.value: A collection of type that contains the attributes in the statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The collection contains the Attribute elements contained in the AttributeStatement element.
